title: Evalentum
description: In my journey (Ravinthiran, Founder and CEO of Evaluation), evaluation and feedback shaped my growth, but finding the right co-founder and startup mentor is tough—65% of startups fail due to founder conflicts. What if AI could evaluate skills and personality traits to create the perfect founder match for me? and a pitch deck-based startup and mentor matchmaking system aligned with my startup vision to solve PMF issues? So, "What gets measured gets managed." – Peter Drucker
